page.title: 06INDUSTRY
page.content: In Jury Lane there is an industrial site. There are three small factories. One makes and repairs motor mowers another deals with builders materials. In Lockgate Road there is a small factory which makes things from steel and other metals.They make prison doors, fire escapes, stair cases, sluice gates, fire guards and most things that can be made from metal.This firm have been involved in some interesting work at St. Thomas' Hospital where they made the fire escape and also at Arundel Cathedral where they made the steel structure for the inside of the spire.
